title: A septic tank filter bed shall be permitted with a capacity of 150 litters per capita, where the municipal services are likely to be available within 4-5 years
clause_text: A septic tank filter bed shall be permitted with a capacity of 150 litters per capita, where the municipal services are likely to be available within 4-5 years. In the rehabilitation component, lift shall not be insisted upon, upto ground plus five floors.
section: Relaxation in Building and Other Requirements

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: A septic tank filter bed shall be permitted with a capacity of 150 litters per capita, where the municipal services are likely to be available within 4-5 years.
